edu.buffalo.cse.ir.wikiindexer.wikipedia
Class WikipediaParser

java.lang.Object
  edu.buffalo.cse.ir.wikiindexer.wikipedia.WikipediaParser

public class WikipediaParser
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
nikhillo This class implements Wikipedia markup processing. Wikipedia markup details are presented here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Help:Wiki_markup It is expected that all methods marked "todo" will be implemented by students. All methods are static as the class is not expected to maintain any state.

Returns:

parseTagFormatting

Method to parse *any* HTML style tags like: For most cases, simply removing the tags should work.

Returns:
The parsed text with the markup removed.

parseTemplates

public static java.lang.String parseTemplates(java.lang.String text)
Method to parse wikipedia templates. These are *any* {{xyz}} tags For most cases, simply removing the tags should work.

Parameters:
text: - The text to be parsed
Returns:
The parsed text with the markup removed

parseLinks

public static java.lang.String[] parseLinks(java.lang.String text)
Method to parse links and URLs. Refer: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Help:Wiki_markup#Links_and_URLs

Parameters:
text: - The text to be parsed
Returns:
An array containing two elements as follows - The 0th element is the parsed text as visible to the user on the page The 1st element is the link url
